scripts.delocal: git ls-remote --tags --refs origin | cut -f2 | xargs git push origin --delete
scripts.delremote: npm run push && git ls-remote --tags --refs origin | cut -f2 | xargs git push origin --delete
scripts.build: ncc build index.js --license licenses.txt && git add .
scripts.push: npm run delocal && npm run del &&  git pull
scripts.tags: git tag -a -m " v$npm_package_version automated deployment $npm_package_time" v$npm_package_version  && git push --follow-tags && echo $npm_version_added
scripts.newTag: git tag -a -m " v$npm_package_version automated deployment $npm_package_time" v$npm_package_version
scripts.sample: echo hello $npm_package_author_name, your commut is complete
